name: CongestiveHeartFailureDiagnosis
title: Congestive heart failure Diagnosis
description: "This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnosis terms representing Congestive heart failure.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a diagnosis of Congestive heart failure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes Congestive heart failure diagnosis concepts from SNOMED CT and ICD-10-CM.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
